fixes.name: abs(SUM([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])) / TOTAL(abs(SUM([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])))
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Numerator = ABS( SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]) )
VAR Denominator = CALCULATE( ABS( SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]) ), ALL('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)') )
RETURN DIVIDE(Numerator, Denominator, 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted ABS and SUM directly to DAX ABS and SUM. Tableau TOTAL (table calculation) is translated to a full-table context using CALCULATE(..., ALL(table)) to compute the overall total. Wrapped numerator and denominator in VARs and used DIVIDE for safe division. The column reference was rewritten to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)].
